titles.title: Federal Employee Pay Compression Relief Act of 2023
Federal Employee Pay Compression Relief Act of 2023
To remove cost-of-living adjustments and locality adjustment payments from the calculation of certain limits on the pay of Federal employees, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on Armed Services, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
